formulas.raw: Baseline AI by sex/life stage: $$ B = \begin{cases} 3.7 & \text{L/day (male)} \\ 2.7 & \text{L/day (female)} \\ 3.0 & \text{L/day (pregnant)} \\ 3.8 & \text{L/day (lactating)} \end{cases} $$ Exercise addition (ACSM): $$ E = r \times \frac{t}{60} \quad \text{with } r \in [0.4,\,0.8] \text{ L/h and } t \text{ in minutes} $$ Total water target: $$ T = B + E $$ Beverages target (approximate): $$ \text{Beverages} \approx 0.8 \times T $$ Unit conversions: $$ 1\,\text{L} = 33.814\,\text{fl oz} \quad ; \quad 1\,\text{US cup} = 240\,\text{mL} = 0.24\,\text{L} $$
